settings.slider_titel2:
Welcome to the World of
Healthy Lifestyle.

settings.html_content:
Testimonials

What our clients say

Vandana Yadav

Gurgaon

My first time using a bamboo toothbrush and I must say, I enjoy this set. The esthetic of the brush is very appealing and cute. I personally enjoy the most how weightless they are, I didn't expect that.

Romana

New Delhi

From long time looking for option in place of plastic brush because I don't want to use Plastic. Not good for environment and health too. Thanks for bamboorian brand.

Aseem Majumdar

Uttar Pradesh

For quite a while searching for an alternative instead of a plastic brush, I would prefer not to utilize Plastic. Not useful for climate and wellbeing too. Thanks for bamboorian brand.

Sushmita Singh

New Delhi

Happened to buy a pack of these right before I travelled. The packaging was pretty neat and had a lot of information on it about the brush as well as switching to a sustainable lifestyle.

Aman Gulati

Mumbai

It's definitely a much more eco-friendly option than using regular toothbrushes. Bristles are nice and soft. I am surely gonna keep buying this every time.

Amit Taneja

Noida

I have started using my first bamboo brush from Bamboorian and absolutely loved it. The bristles, although softer to touch than perhaps a regular toothbrush does a great job of cleaning and do not get bent, damaged or anything of that kind.

Varun Ahuja

Lucknow

Great for green living beginners. A small switch in your morning routine can go a long way in saving the environment. Tounge cleaning experience is as good as any plastic counterpart.

Kamal Gulati

Uttrakhand

It's a brave and great initiative, hopefully this will reduce the plastic waste around us. Hope a lot of people get to know the immediate use of the product along with the long term benefits of replacing plastics with Natural products.

Upender Chaudhary

Hyderabad

The soft bristles and the wodden body gives an eco friendly feel to it and its well placed bristles allows the toothbrush to reach areas in your mouth which a plastic toothbrush won't normally reach.

Akash Kumar

Haryana

I like the simplicity of the design and the wooden texture which gives a very traditional look and feel. Would definitely recommend it and last but not the least, it's value for money and of course, with no compromise on quality.

Gopal

Uttar Pradesh

A good initiative by Bamboorian for launching eco friendly bamboo products it is a small but most important step towards conservation of our ecosystem.

Priyanka

West Bengal

In such a modern world its necessary to know your roots and stick to them.Plastic being such a harmful substance is still used but we must remember to use this eco friendly bamboo ear cleaning buds by Bamboorian

Cruelty Free

Organic Products

Eco Friendly
